amendment.description: To ensure accountability in Federal grant programs administered by the Department of Justice.

action.text: Amendment SA 860 proposed by Senator Blunt for Senator Grassley to Amendment SA 738.
Amendment SA 860 under the order of 10/19/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 54. Record Vote Number: 175.
